job.title: Junior Data Scientist
job.description: strongLocation Gilbert AZ or Orlando FL preferredbrbrstrongDeloitte Consulting LLP is one of the worlds leading management consulting firms for executable strategy operations technology and human capital advisory services We provide powerful business solutions to some of the worlds most wellknown and respected companies including more than 75 percent of the Fortune 100brbrstrong The Platforms Machine Learning Group brbrstrongThe machine learning group sits in the Deloitte Platform DP practice part of Deloitte Consulting LLP which supports the firm on a technical level to offer a variety of mixed services to provide the clients needs The machine learning team specifically focusses on creating products and solutions that require deeper analytical and problemsolving skills to create tangible results This is a continuous cycle where we strive to keep innovating and provide stateoftheart assetsbrbrstrong Junior Data Scientist Position Scope brbrstrongAs a junior data scientist you will focus on supporting the machine learning group and actively participate in all the processes in a data science project As a newcomer in the field the initial focus will be on data cleaning wrangling and exploratory data analysis Later the focus extends to feature generation and selection creating models and boost their performance amp accuracy as well as guiding more junior resources and act as a sounding board It is important that the person in this role is proactive and independent You should be a problem solver with an open mind and an eagerness to pickup new skills ranging from deeper statistical analysis and better modeling skills to honing programming and communication skillsbrbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongCompetitive candidates for this role will possess the followingbrulliKnowledge of Python Numpy Pandas Scikit etc or R Preferably bothliliGood knowledge of statistics scientific method data collection and cleaningliliFirst experience with commonly used machine learning algorithmsliliKnowledge of deep learning NLP or big data analytics tools eg Apache Spark is a plusliliKnowledge of UNIX experience with Google and Amazon Machine Learning and Cloud tools is a plusliliGoal oriented with high standards for quality and performanceliliAbility to work on multiple projects simultaneouslyliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsliliMS in Computer Science Engineering Mathematics Physics or related fields OR BS and two years of related work experiencebrliulstronguAbout DeloittebrbrustrongAt Deloitte you can have a rewarding career on every level As a dynamic and leading edge company Deloitte offers a phenomenal opportunity for staff to join a high growth environment to expand enhance and strengthen their client service and technology skills In addition to challenging and meaningful work youll have the chance to give back to your community make a positive impact on the environment participate in a range of diversity and inclusion initiatives and find the support coaching and training it takes to advance your career To learn more about our culture benefits and to submit your resume visit us at wwwdeloittecomuscareers brbrstronguQualificationsbrbrustrongRequiredbrulliMS in Computer Science Software engineering or related field OR BS and 3 years of related work experienceliliBackground in statistics scientific methods or mathematicsliliExperience in Python amp Unix Shell ScriptingliliFamiliar with commonly used machine learning algorithmsliliGoal oriented with high standards for quality and performanceliliAbility to manage multiple projects simultaneouslyliliExcellent verbal and written communication skillsbrliulPreferredbrulliExperience with cloud platforms such as Google Could Platform or Microsoft AzureliliExperience of modeling on natural language or image dataliliFamiliar with machine learning model development life cyclesliliFamiliar with tools for Python program profiling and optimizationbrliulMust be legally authorized to work in the United States without the need for employer sponsorship now or at any time in the futurebrbrSNET22
